project.name: Lichess Clone
project.description: A comprehensive chess platform clone of Lichess built with Django backend (Hacksoft styleguide) and React frontend (Bulletproof React patterns)

patterns.backend: Hacksoft Django Styleguide - services/selectors architecture, APIView pattern
patterns.frontend: Bulletproof React - feature-based organization, TanStack Query, shadcn/ui, direct imports
patterns.workflow: Autonomous harness ticket-driven workflow: research → plan → implement → validate

phases.name: Foundation
phases.description: Project setup, infrastructure, and core scaffolding

phases.name: Core Chess Engine
phases.description: Chess rules implementation, move validation, and game state management

phases.name: Authentication & Users
phases.description: User accounts, profiles, settings, and authentication flows

phases.name: Real-time Infrastructure
phases.description: WebSockets, Django Channels, and real-time game communication

phases.name: Game Mechanics
phases.description: Time controls, clocks, game matching, and game lifecycle

phases.name: Analysis & Training
phases.description: Analysis board, puzzles, engine integration, and learning features

phases.name: Rating & Competitive
phases.description: Glicko-2 rating system, tournaments, and leaderboards

phases.name: Social Features
phases.description: Teams, chat, messaging, friends, and community features

phases.name: Content & Discovery
phases.description: Opening explorer, tablebase, TV/broadcasts, and studies

phases.name: API & Polish
phases.description: Public API, mobile support, performance optimization, and monitoring

tickets.title: Initialize Django project using init-django-backend skill
tickets.description: Use /init-django-backend skill to set up Django backend. This runs cookiecutter-django with recommended options, applies Hacksoft Django Styleguide patterns (services.py, selectors.py, apis.py structure), and configures django-allauth headless for React SPA authentication. Creates common app with exception handlers.

tickets.title: Initialize React frontend following Bulletproof React patterns
tickets.description: Set up React frontend using Vite, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, and React Router. Follow Bulletproof React architecture: feature-based folder structure (src/features/), shared components (src/shared/), TanStack Query for server state, Zod for validation, shadcn/ui component library. Configure direct imports (no barrel files), ESLint with import/no-restricted-paths for feature isolation.

tickets.title: Configure Docker Compose for full-stack development
tickets.description: Create unified Docker Compose configuration for running Django, React, PostgreSQL, Redis, and nginx together. Include hot-reloading for development.

tickets.title: Set up Django REST Framework with Hacksoft API patterns
tickets.description: Configure DRF following Hacksoft styleguide: use APIView (not ViewSets), InputSerializer/OutputSerializer pattern, inline serializers. APIs call services for writes and selectors for reads. Configure hacksoft_exception_handler. Set up API versioning with /api/v1/ prefix.

tickets.title: Configure CORS and api-client for frontend-backend communication
tickets.description: Set up CORS headers for development and production. Create @/lib/api-client.ts following Bulletproof pattern: typed API client using fetch/axios with interceptors for auth tokens and standardized error handling. This client is used by all TanStack Query hooks.

tickets.title: Set up Redis caching layer
tickets.description: Configure Redis as Django cache backend and session store. Set up connection pooling and health checks.

tickets.title: Create base Django models following Hacksoft patterns
tickets.description: Set up abstract base models with common fields (created_at, updated_at, uuid). Follow Hacksoft: models define data structure and simple validation only. Business logic goes in services (writes) and selectors (reads). Model properties for computed fields. No custom managers for business logic - use selectors instead.

tickets.title: Set up Celery for background task processing
tickets.description: Configure Celery with Redis as broker. Set up beat scheduler for periodic tasks. Create base task classes with retry logic.

tickets.title: Set up shadcn/ui component library with Bulletproof structure
tickets.description: Install and configure shadcn/ui as the component library. Place base components in src/shared/components/ui/. Create feature-scoped components in src/features/[name]/components/. All components use Tailwind CSS. Direct imports only - no barrel files. Follow component composition patterns from Bulletproof React.

tickets.title: Configure state management following Bulletproof six-state pattern
tickets.description: Set up state management per Bulletproof decision tree: (1) URL state via React Router params, (2) Server state via TanStack Query (primary for API data), (3) Local state via useState, (4) Global client state via Zustand (UI preferences, game UI state), (5) Context for theme/identity, (6) React Hook Form for forms. Zustand only for cross-cutting UI state not derived from server.

tickets.title: Set up logging and error tracking
tickets.description: Configure structured logging in Django with JSON format. Set up Sentry for error tracking in both frontend and backend.

tickets.title: Create health check endpoints
tickets.description: Implement /health and /ready endpoints for Django. Check database, Redis, and Celery connectivity. Add frontend health indicator.

tickets.title: Set up CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions
tickets.description: Create GitHub Actions workflows for linting, testing, and building. Configure separate jobs for backend and frontend.

tickets.title: Configure environment variable management
tickets.description: Set up django-environ for backend config. Create .env.example files and document all required variables. Configure React environment handling.

tickets.title: Set up database connection pooling
tickets.description: Configure PgBouncer or Django's built-in connection pooling. Set up read replicas support for future scaling.

tickets.title: Create Django apps following Hacksoft structure
tickets.description: Create initial Django apps: users, games, chess, ratings, puzzles, tournaments, teams. Each app follows Hacksoft structure: models.py (data), services.py (write operations with full_clean/save), selectors.py (read operations), apis.py (APIView endpoints), tasks.py (Celery tasks calling services). Define app boundaries - apps can import from each other's services/selectors.

tickets.title: Set up React feature modules following Bulletproof structure
tickets.description: Create feature directories in src/features/: auth, game, analysis, puzzle, tournament, social. Each feature has: api/ (TanStack Query hooks with three-part pattern: schema, fetcher, hook), components/, hooks/, types/ (Zod schemas + TypeScript types). Features cannot import from other features - only from src/shared/. Use /bulletproof-react-styleguide skill for patterns.

tickets.title: Configure nginx reverse proxy
tickets.description: Set up nginx to proxy API requests to Django and serve React static files. Configure WebSocket upgrade handling for future real-time features.

tickets.title: Set up testing infrastructure
tickets.description: Configure pytest for Django with factories (factory_boy) and fixtures. Set up Vitest for React with React Testing Library. Create test database configuration.

tickets.title: Create development seed data scripts
tickets.description: Build management commands to seed development database with sample users, games, and test data. Create fixtures for consistent testing.

tickets.title: Integrate python-chess library with Hacksoft service pattern
tickets.description: Install python-chess as core chess engine. Create chess/services.py with pure functions (not a class) for chess operations following Hacksoft: board_validate_move(), board_apply_move(), board_get_legal_moves(). Use keyword-only arguments with *. Type annotate all functions. These services are called by game services and APIs.

tickets.title: Create Board model and FEN handling
tickets.description: Implement Board model that stores FEN strings. Add methods for FEN validation, parsing, and board state reconstruction.

tickets.title: Implement move validation service functions
tickets.description: Create chess/services.py functions (not a class): move_validate(*, fen: str, uci_move: str) -> bool, move_is_legal(*, board: Board, move: str) -> bool. Follow Hacksoft pattern: pure functions with keyword-only args, type annotations. Handle castling, en passant, promotion. Services are stateless - board state passed as argument.

tickets.title: Create legal move generation service
tickets.description: Build service to generate all legal moves for a given position. Return moves in UCI format (e.g., e2e4, e7e8q for promotion).

tickets.title: Implement game outcome detection
tickets.description: Create service to detect checkmate, stalemate, insufficient material, threefold repetition, and 50-move rule. Return appropriate game result codes.

tickets.title: Create PGN parsing and export service
tickets.description: Implement PGN parser to import games with headers and move annotations. Build PGN export with standard headers and move notation.

tickets.title: Integrate Chessground in game feature following Bulletproof patterns
tickets.description: Install react-chessground or create custom wrapper in src/features/game/components/. Follow Bulletproof: component in kebab-case file (chessboard.tsx), named export, props interface with TypeScript, ABOUTME comments. Style with Tailwind CSS. Configuration for themes/piece sets in src/features/game/config.ts.

tickets.title: Create ChessBoard React component
tickets.description: Build reusable ChessBoard component using Chessground. Support view mode (analysis) and play mode with move input. Handle board orientation.

tickets.title: Implement move input handling in frontend
tickets.description: Handle piece drag-and-drop and click-to-move. Show legal move indicators on hover. Implement pre-moves for faster play.

tickets.title: Create promotion dialog component
tickets.description: Build modal/popup for pawn promotion piece selection. Show Queen, Rook, Bishop, Knight options. Handle touch and click selection.

tickets.title: Build move list component
tickets.description: Create component to display game moves in algebraic notation. Support click-to-navigate, current move highlighting, and scrolling.

tickets.title: Implement check and checkmate indicators
tickets.description: Add visual indicators for check (king square highlight) and checkmate. Show last move highlighting on board.

tickets.title: Create captured pieces display component
tickets.description: Build component showing captured pieces for both sides. Calculate and display material advantage.

tickets.title: Implement board theme and piece set selection
tickets.description: Add support for multiple board themes (wood, blue, green) and piece sets (cburnett, merida, alpha). Store preferences locally.

tickets.title: Create chess variant model infrastructure
tickets.description: Design model structure to support chess variants (Standard, Chess960, Crazyhouse, etc.). Add variant field to game models.

tickets.title: Implement Chess960 support
tickets.description: Add support for Fischer Random Chess (Chess960). Implement position generation and castling rules for random starting positions.

tickets.title: Create position evaluation display component
tickets.description: Build component to display engine evaluation bar. Show centipawn values and mate-in-N. Support both static and animated updates.

tickets.title: Implement board coordinate toggle
tickets.description: Add option to show/hide algebraic coordinates on board edges. Support both inside and outside coordinate placement.

tickets.title: Create move annotation support
tickets.description: Add support for chess move annotations (!, ?, !!, ??, !?, ?!). Display annotations in move list and support adding them.

tickets.title: Implement board arrows and highlights drawing
tickets.description: Add support for drawing arrows and square highlights on the board. Allow users to right-click drag for arrows, shift+click for highlights.

tickets.title: Create User model with chess-specific fields
tickets.description: Extend Django user model with chess profile fields: country, title (GM, IM, etc.), bio, flair. Add patron status and join date.

tickets.title: Implement user registration with Hacksoft service pattern
tickets.description: Create users/services.py: user_create(*, email: str, username: str, password: str) -> User. Follow Hacksoft: full_clean() before save(), @transaction.atomic, keyword-only args. Registration logic delegates to allauth-headless endpoints. Email verification via allauth. Username validation in model clean().

tickets.title: Create login and logout functionality
tickets.description: Implement JWT-based authentication. Create login endpoint with remember-me option. Handle token refresh and logout/token invalidation.

tickets.title: Build auth feature with Bulletproof provider pattern
tickets.description: Create src/features/auth/ following Bulletproof provider pattern for swappable auth (allauth-headless). Structure: types/ (AuthContext interface), providers/auth-context.ts, providers/allauth-provider.tsx, hooks/use-auth.ts, config.ts (provider selection). TanStack Query for auth state. Integrates with allauth headless endpoints.

tickets.title: Create login and registration forms with React Hook Form + Zod
tickets.description: Build src/features/auth/components/login-form.tsx and register-form.tsx. Use React Hook Form for form state, Zod schemas for validation (in types/). shadcn/ui Form components. TanStack Query mutations for API calls (api/login.ts, api/register.ts following three-part pattern). Direct imports, no barrel files.

tickets.title: Implement password reset flow
tickets.description: Create forgot password and reset password endpoints. Send reset emails via Celery. Implement secure token generation and validation.

tickets.title: Create user profile page
tickets.description: Build profile page showing user info, game statistics, recent games, and activity. Support viewing own and other user profiles.

tickets.title: Build user settings page
tickets.description: Create settings page with tabs for account, preferences, privacy, and security. Implement setting save with optimistic updates.

tickets.title: Create UserPreferences model
tickets.description: Design preferences model for board theme, piece set, sound settings, animation speed, show ratings, and display options.

tickets.title: Implement account deletion
tickets.description: Build account closure flow with data export option. Anonymize game data while preserving game history. Implement grace period before deletion.

tickets.title: Create user search functionality
tickets.description: Implement user search by username with autocomplete. Add filters for online status, rating range, and title.

tickets.title: Implement user blocking
tickets.description: Add ability to block users. Blocked users cannot challenge, message, or follow. Create blocked users management UI.

tickets.title: Create following/followers system
tickets.description: Implement follow functionality between users. Show follower/following counts on profile. Create feed of followed users' activity.

tickets.title: Build user activity feed
tickets.description: Create activity feed showing games played, tournaments joined, and achievements. Implement pagination and filtering.

tickets.title: Implement titled player verification
tickets.description: Create flow for FIDE-titled players to verify titles. Admin approval workflow with document/proof submission.

tickets.title: Create avatar/profile picture support
tickets.description: Implement profile picture upload with image resizing. Support avatar removal and default avatars. Add NSFW detection placeholder.

tickets.title: Implement session management
tickets.description: Show active sessions with device info. Allow users to revoke sessions from other devices. Implement forced logout on password change.

tickets.title: Create email preferences management
tickets.description: Build preferences for email notifications: game alerts, tournament reminders, newsletter. Implement one-click unsubscribe.

tickets.title: Implement kid mode
tickets.description: Create kid-friendly mode that disables chat and hides certain features. Require parent/guardian confirmation. Add visual indicator.

tickets.title: Create user roles and permissions system
tickets.description: Implement role-based access control for mods, admins, and special users. Create permission checking decorators and hooks.

tickets.title: Install and configure Django Channels
tickets.description: Set up Django Channels with Redis channel layer. Configure ASGI application and routing. Create base WebSocket consumer.

tickets.title: Create WebSocket authentication
tickets.description: Implement JWT authentication for WebSocket connections. Create middleware for auth token validation on connection.

tickets.title: Build game room consumer
tickets.description: Create WebSocket consumer for individual game rooms. Handle player join/leave, move submission, and game events.

tickets.title: Create WebSocket hooks following Bulletproof patterns
tickets.description: Create src/features/game/hooks/use-game-socket.ts for game WebSocket connections. Follow Bulletproof: custom hook pattern, TypeScript types in types/, handle reconnection with exponential backoff, message queuing during disconnect. Integrate with TanStack Query for cache invalidation on game state changes.

tickets.title: Create game state synchronization protocol
tickets.description: Design and implement protocol for syncing game state: moves, clock times, draw offers, resignations. Handle message ordering.

tickets.title: Implement lobby/matchmaking consumer
tickets.description: Create consumer for game lobby showing available seeks. Broadcast new seeks, removed seeks, and game starts.

tickets.title: Build presence tracking system
tickets.description: Implement online/offline status tracking using WebSocket connections. Create presence broadcast for profile pages and friend lists.

tickets.title: Create connection recovery and reconnection logic
tickets.description: Implement automatic reconnection with exponential backoff. Handle game state recovery after disconnect. Queue moves during offline.

tickets.title: Implement spectator mode WebSocket
tickets.description: Create read-only WebSocket connection for game spectators. Handle spectator count broadcasting. Limit spectator connections if needed.

tickets.title: Build real-time notification system
tickets.description: Create notification consumer for challenges, messages, and game events. Implement notification preferences filtering.

tickets.title: Create game seek broadcasting
tickets.description: Implement real-time broadcast of game seeks. Filter seeks by user preferences (rating range, time control). Handle seek expiration.

tickets.title: Implement lag compensation
tickets.description: Create lag measurement between client and server. Adjust clock display and move timing to account for network latency.

tickets.title: Build tournament live updates consumer
tickets.description: Create consumer for tournament standings updates. Broadcast game results, pairing updates, and tournament completion.

tickets.title: Create challenge system WebSocket
tickets.description: Implement real-time challenge sending, accepting, and declining. Show pending challenges with live updates.

tickets.title: Implement connection rate limiting
tickets.description: Add rate limiting for WebSocket connections per user. Prevent connection flooding and resource exhaustion.

tickets.title: Create WebSocket message validation
tickets.description: Implement schema validation for incoming WebSocket messages. Reject malformed messages with error responses.

tickets.title: Build connection metrics and monitoring
tickets.description: Instrument WebSocket connections with metrics. Track message latency, connection duration, and error rates.

tickets.title: Implement typing indicator for chat
tickets.description: Create typing indicator broadcast for chat rooms. Debounce typing events to reduce message volume.

tickets.title: Create horizontal scaling support for Channels
tickets.description: Configure Redis Pub/Sub for multi-instance deployment. Test WebSocket routing across multiple worker processes.

tickets.title: Build WebSocket connection debugging tools
tickets.description: Create admin tools for viewing active connections, sending test messages, and force-disconnecting users.

tickets.title: Create Game model following Hacksoft patterns
tickets.description: Design Game model in games/models.py with players, time control, status, result, moves (JSONField), timestamps. Model defines data structure only - lifecycle logic goes in games/services.py (game_create, game_make_move, game_resign, game_offer_draw). Read queries in games/selectors.py (game_get, game_list_for_user). Add DB indexes for efficient queries.

tickets.title: Implement time control model
tickets.description: Create TimeControl model supporting initial time, increment, and delay. Add helpers for category classification (bullet, blitz, rapid).

tickets.title: Build server-side clock management
tickets.description: Implement clock service tracking remaining time per player. Handle increment addition after moves. Detect timeout losses.

tickets.title: Create client-side clock display component
tickets.description: Build chess clock component showing both players' time. Handle real-time countdown with server sync. Show low-time warnings.

tickets.title: Implement game creation service with Hacksoft pattern
tickets.description: Create games/services.py: game_create(*, white: User, black: User, time_control: TimeControl, rated: bool, variant: str) -> Game. Follow Hacksoft: @transaction.atomic, full_clean() before save(), keyword-only args, type annotations. Validate player eligibility (not self, not blocked). Return created Game instance.

tickets.title: Build game seek system
tickets.description: Implement game seek creation and matching. Store seeks in Redis for fast matching. Handle seek expiration and removal.

tickets.title: Create quick pairing matchmaking
tickets.description: Implement automatic matchmaking pool. Match players by rating with expanding range over time. Optimize for fast pairing.

tickets.title: Build game lobby UI
tickets.description: Create lobby page showing available game seeks. Implement filtering by time control, variant, rating range. Allow seek creation.

tickets.title: Implement challenge system
tickets.description: Create direct challenge functionality between users. Support custom time controls and variants. Handle challenge accept/decline.

tickets.title: Create live game page following Bulletproof patterns
tickets.description: Build src/features/game/components/live-game-page.tsx composing board, clocks, move list, player info components. Follow Bulletproof: feature-scoped components, direct imports, TanStack Query for game data, custom hooks for game logic (use-game-actions.ts). shadcn/ui for UI elements, Tailwind for layout. WebSocket integration via use-game-socket hook.

tickets.title: Implement draw offer system
tickets.description: Add draw offer, accept, and decline functionality. Enforce anti-repetition rules (no spam offers). Sync draw state via WebSocket.

tickets.title: Create resignation functionality
tickets.description: Implement game resignation with confirmation. Update game result and notify opponent via WebSocket.

tickets.title: Implement game abort rules
tickets.description: Allow game abort before move 2. Handle timeout abort differently from resignation. Update game status appropriately.

tickets.title: Create rematch system
tickets.description: Implement rematch offer after game completion. Swap colors between rematches. Handle rematch timeout.

tickets.title: Build game result display
tickets.description: Create game end overlay showing result, rating change, and rematch option. Display game summary statistics.

tickets.title: Implement correspondence game support
tickets.description: Add support for correspondence games with days per move. Handle email notifications for moves. No real-time clock needed.

tickets.title: Create game history page
tickets.description: Build page listing user's past games. Filter by opponent, result, time control. Support pagination and search.

tickets.title: Implement pre-moves
tickets.description: Add premove functionality for faster play. Queue up to 3 premoves. Execute premoves on opponent's move. Handle invalid premoves.

tickets.title: Create takebacks request system
tickets.description: Implement takeback request and approval. Only for casual games. Handle undo of move and clock adjustment.

tickets.title: Build game export functionality
tickets.description: Create PGN export for individual games and game collections. Include headers, moves, and annotations. Support download and clipboard.

tickets.title: Integrate Stockfish.js for browser analysis
tickets.description: Set up Stockfish WASM in web worker. Create worker communication layer. Handle engine initialization and cleanup.

tickets.title: Create analysis board page
tickets.description: Build full analysis board with move tree navigation, engine lines, and evaluation graph. Support game import via PGN/FEN.

tickets.title: Implement engine depth and multipv settings
tickets.description: Add UI controls for engine search depth and number of lines (multiPV). Persist settings in preferences.

tickets.title: Build variation tree display
tickets.description: Create component for displaying move variations as a tree. Support adding, deleting, and promoting variations.

tickets.title: Create Puzzle model
tickets.description: Design Puzzle model with FEN, solution moves, themes, rating, play count, and source game reference.

tickets.title: Build puzzle player UI
tickets.description: Create puzzle solving interface. Show opponent's move, accept only correct moves, provide hints system. Track attempts.

tickets.title: Implement puzzle rating system
tickets.description: Apply Glicko-2 to puzzle solving. Update both player puzzle rating and puzzle difficulty based on solve results.

tickets.title: Create puzzle themes/tags system
tickets.description: Implement puzzle theme classification: fork, pin, skewer, back rank, etc. Allow filtering puzzles by theme.

tickets.title: Build puzzle streak mode
tickets.description: Create endless puzzle mode where streak ends on first failure. Track high scores. Show streak counter.

tickets.title: Implement puzzle storm mode
tickets.description: Create timed puzzle solving (3-5 minutes). Count correct solves. Track personal bests. Create leaderboard.

tickets.title: Create puzzle dashboard
tickets.description: Build puzzle home page showing rating, daily puzzle, recent activity, and theme breakdown chart.

tickets.title: Import Lichess puzzle database
tickets.description: Create management command to import puzzles from Lichess database CSV. Handle incremental updates.

tickets.title: Build learn section basics page
tickets.description: Create interactive chess lessons for beginners: piece movement, special moves, check, checkmate patterns.

tickets.title: Implement coordinate training
tickets.description: Create coordinate training game. Flash square names, user clicks square. Track speed and accuracy. Color mode option.

tickets.title: Create practice positions feature
tickets.description: Implement practice mode for specific position types: checkmate patterns, endgames. Show solution on demand.

tickets.title: Build server-side analysis with fishnet
tickets.description: Create distributed analysis system. Queue positions for analysis. Store analysis results. Rate limit per user.

tickets.title: Implement game analysis request
tickets.description: Allow users to request full game analysis. Show analysis progress. Display blunders, mistakes, and inaccuracies.

tickets.title: Create accuracy percentage calculation
tickets.description: Calculate centipawn loss per move. Compute overall game accuracy percentage. Compare to typical levels.

tickets.title: Build insights/statistics page
tickets.description: Create page showing playing patterns: favorite openings, performance by time control, rating history chart.

tickets.title: Implement retrograde analysis display
tickets.description: Show what-if analysis for alternative moves. Display evaluation changes. Navigate through variations.

tickets.title: Create Rating model with Glicko-2 support
tickets.description: Design Rating model storing rating, RD, volatility per category (bullet, blitz, rapid, etc.). Track rating history.

tickets.title: Implement Glicko-2 rating calculation
tickets.description: Build Glicko-2 algorithm following python-chess or custom implementation. Handle rating updates after games.

tickets.title: Create rating deviation management
tickets.description: Implement RD increase over time for inactive players. Mark ratings as provisional when RD > 110.

tickets.title: Build leaderboards
tickets.description: Create leaderboard pages for each rating category. Show top 100 players. Include country and title filters.

tickets.title: Create Tournament model
tickets.description: Design Tournament model supporting Arena and Swiss formats. Include schedule, time control, status, and results.

tickets.title: Implement Arena tournament format

tickets.title: Build Arena pairing algorithm
tickets.description: Implement minimum weight matching for Arena. Consider score proximity, recent opponents, color balance.

tickets.title: Create tournament lobby UI
tickets.description: Build tournament waiting room showing countdown, participants, and seeding. Handle player join/leave.

tickets.title: Implement tournament standings display
tickets.description: Create live standings with score, tiebreak, games played. Highlight current game. Update in real-time.

tickets.title: Build tournament creation UI
tickets.description: Create form for creating tournaments. Include time control, duration, rating restrictions. Support scheduled tournaments.

tickets.title: Implement Swiss tournament format
tickets.description: Build Swiss system with fixed rounds. Implement Dutch pairing algorithm. Handle odd number of players (byes).

tickets.title: Create Swiss pairing algorithm
tickets.description: Implement FIDE-style Swiss pairing. Balance colors, avoid repeat pairings, handle floaters.

tickets.title: Build tournament calendar
tickets.description: Create calendar view of upcoming tournaments. Filter by time control, variant, rating. Support favorites.

tickets.title: Implement tournament tiebreaks
tickets.description: Calculate tiebreaks: Buchholz, Sonneborn-Berger, performance rating. Apply based on format.

tickets.title: Create tournament history page
tickets.description: Show past tournaments user participated in. Display finish position, score, and rating change.

tickets.title: Implement tournament prizes display
tickets.description: Show trophy/medal icons for podium finishes. Display prize breakdown if applicable.

tickets.title: Create rating graph component
tickets.description: Build interactive rating history chart. Support multiple time controls on same graph. Show date range selection.

tickets.title: Implement rating percentile display
tickets.description: Calculate and show user's rating percentile. Display distribution charts by rating category.

tickets.title: Build simul (simultaneous exhibition) support
tickets.description: Create simul format where one player faces multiple opponents. Handle timing and board cycling.

tickets.title: Create tournament notification system
tickets.description: Send reminders before tournaments start. Notify when round begins. Email and in-app notifications.

tickets.title: Create Team model
tickets.description: Design Team model with name, description, leader, members, and join policy (open/request/closed).

tickets.title: Build team creation and management
tickets.description: Implement team creation form. Allow leaders to manage members, settings, and description.

tickets.description: Create achievement badges for milestones: games played, puzzles solved, tournament wins. Display on profile.

tickets.title: Create team tournaments
tickets.description: Implement team-restricted tournaments. Only team members can join. Show team branding.

tickets.title: Build team forum/discussion area
tickets.description: Create team-private discussion area. Support announcements and pinned posts. Leader moderation.

tickets.title: Integrate opening explorer API
tickets.description: Connect to Lichess opening explorer API or build own. Show move statistics from master games and Lichess games.

tickets.title: Build opening explorer UI
tickets.description: Create UI showing opening statistics per move. Display win/draw/loss percentages, move popularity, and top games.

tickets.title: Create opening classification system
tickets.description: Implement ECO code classification. Store opening names and main lines. Auto-tag games with opening.

tickets.title: Integrate tablebase API
tickets.description: Connect to Syzygy tablebase API. Query endgame positions for DTZ/DTM values. Cache results.

tickets.title: Build tablebase display UI
tickets.description: Show tablebase results in analysis. Display optimal moves and distance to mate/zeroing. Integrate with board.

tickets.title: Create Chess TV feature
tickets.description: Build live game spectating feature. Auto-select interesting games. Support multiple channels (by rating, time control).

tickets.title: Implement broadcast/relay system
tickets.description: Create system for relaying external chess events. Parse PGN feeds. Show live moves with sync.

tickets.title: Build broadcast viewing page
tickets.description: Create multi-board view for broadcasts. Show player info, clocks, and standings. Support following specific boards.

tickets.title: Create Study model
tickets.description: Design Study model supporting multiple chapters, collaborators, and visibility settings. Store variations and annotations.

tickets.title: Build study editor UI
tickets.description: Create full study editor with chapter management, move annotations, and arrow/highlight drawing. Support real-time collaboration.

tickets.title: Implement study sharing
tickets.description: Add study visibility controls: private, unlisted, public. Generate share links. Support study embedding.

tickets.title: Create study practice mode
tickets.description: Build interactive mode where learners guess moves. Show feedback on correct/incorrect. Track progress through study.

tickets.title: Build game database search
tickets.description: Create searchable game database. Filter by players, opening, date, result. Support position search.

tickets.title: Implement game import from PGN files
tickets.description: Allow bulk PGN import from file upload. Validate and store games. Show import progress and errors.

tickets.title: Create GIF export for games
tickets.description: Generate animated GIF of game moves. Support speed control and board theme. Allow social sharing.

tickets.title: Build game embed widget
tickets.description: Create embeddable game viewer for external sites. Support customization: board size, controls, autoplay.

tickets.title: Implement video/stream integration
tickets.description: Allow linking Twitch/YouTube streams to profiles. Show streaming indicator. List active streamers.

tickets.title: Create coach directory
tickets.description: Build directory of chess coaches. Support profiles, reviews, and contact. Filter by rating, language, price.

tickets.title: Implement world records tracking
tickets.description: Track site records: fastest checkmate, longest game, highest rating, etc. Show record holders.

tickets.title: Build patron/donation system
tickets.description: Create patron system with optional perks (custom flair). Integrate Stripe for payments. Show patron badges.

tickets.title: Design comprehensive public API
tickets.description: Design REST API covering games, users, puzzles, tournaments. Document with OpenAPI spec. Version API.

tickets.title: Implement API authentication (OAuth2)
tickets.description: Build OAuth2 with PKCE for API access. Create scope system. Generate personal access tokens.

tickets.title: Create API rate limiting
tickets.description: Implement rate limiting per endpoint and per user. Return rate limit headers. Handle bursting gracefully.

tickets.title: Build streaming NDJSON endpoints
tickets.description: Create streaming endpoints for live games and ongoing events. Support real-time data via NDJSON format.

tickets.title: Create API documentation site
tickets.description: Build interactive API documentation with examples. Support try-it-out functionality. Host on subdomain.

tickets.title: Implement bot API
tickets.description: Create API endpoints for chess bot integration. Handle bot accounts, challenge acceptance, and move streaming.

tickets.title: Build mobile-responsive UI
tickets.description: Ensure all pages work on mobile devices. Optimize touch interactions for chess board. Handle orientation changes.

tickets.title: Create PWA support
tickets.description: Add Progressive Web App capabilities. Implement service worker, manifest, and offline support for analysis.

tickets.title: Implement push notifications
tickets.description: Add web push notifications for game challenges, tournament starts, and messages. Handle notification preferences.

tickets.title: Create performance monitoring dashboard
tickets.description: Build internal dashboard showing request latency, WebSocket connections, error rates. Alert on anomalies.

tickets.title: Implement database query optimization
tickets.description: Analyze slow queries with EXPLAIN. Add indexes. Implement query caching. Optimize hot paths.

tickets.title: Build CDN integration
tickets.description: Configure CDN for static assets. Set up proper cache headers. Implement cache invalidation strategy.

tickets.title: Create load testing suite
tickets.description: Build load tests simulating concurrent games and WebSocket connections. Identify bottlenecks. Set performance baselines.

tickets.title: Implement basic anti-cheat detection
tickets.description: Create basic cheat detection: move timing analysis, engine move correlation. Flag suspicious games for review.

tickets.title: Build admin dashboard
tickets.description: Create comprehensive admin dashboard for site statistics, user management, and system health.

tickets.title: Create internationalization (i18n) framework
tickets.description: Set up translation infrastructure for both frontend and backend. Create initial English strings. Support RTL languages.

tickets.title: Implement SEO optimization
tickets.description: Add meta tags, structured data, and sitemap. Optimize page load performance. Implement server-side rendering for key pages.

tickets.title: Create backup and disaster recovery plan
tickets.description: Implement automated database backups. Document recovery procedures. Test restore process. Set up off-site replication.

tickets.title: Build production deployment pipeline
tickets.description: Create production deployment workflow with staging environment. Implement blue-green deployment. Add rollback capability.

tickets.title: Conduct security audit and hardening
tickets.description: Perform security review: OWASP top 10, dependency vulnerabilities, API security. Implement fixes. Document security practices.

metadata.notes: Tickets organized into 10 phases with logical dependencies. Each phase builds on previous phases. Priorities: 1=Critical, 2=High, 3=Medium, 4=Low.

architecture.models: Data structure, simple validation, properties only
architecture.services: Write operations with full_clean()/save(), @transaction.atomic, keyword-only args (*)

architecture.imports: Direct imports only, no barrel files
architecture.server_state: TanStack Query with three-part pattern (schema, fetcher, hook)
architecture.state_decision_tree: URL → Server → Local → Global → Context → Form
